response.job_title: Mechanical Engineer / M. Sc. Engineering and Management of Water Resources
response.summary: I am a Mechanical Engineer with master’s studies in Water Resources Engineering and Management. I am eager to contribute with my enthusiasm, experience and skills to projects aimed towards sustainable development, that improve people's quality of life and that have a positive impact on the environment.
response.skills: Ingeniería mecánica, Energías renovables, Hydraulic turbines, Ingeniería, Tratamiento de aguas, Tratamiento de aguas residuales, Hidráulica, Bombas hidráulicas, Investigación, Ingeniería de proyectos, Diseño asistido por ordenador (CAD), engineering, water treatment, renewable energy, Hydraulics, Consultancy, Matlab, Microsoft Office, AutoCAD, Microsoft Excel

profile_positions.title: Ingeniero de desarrollo de proyectos y automatización

profile_positions.description: Desarrollo de proyectos llave en mano para el tratamiento de aguas residuales cloacales e industriales. Diseño básico y detallado de plantas de tratamiento, procesos de tratamiento, selección de equipos electromecánicos, diseño de redes de tuberías/cañerías e instrumentación. Elaboración de diagramas de procesos, diagramas de tuberías e instrumentación (P&IDs), dibujos técnicos de instalación en CAD por medio del programa AutoCAD Plant 3D, computo métricos. Inspección técnica de equipos en fabrica, supervisión en campo durante desarrollo de proyectos. Elaboración de oferta técnico-económicas.
profile_positions.title: Ingeniero de planificación y procesos

company.name: Institut für Siedlungswasserbau, Wassergüte- und Abfallwirtschaft

profile_positions.company: Institut für Siedlungswasserbau, Wassergüte- und Abfallwirtschaft
profile_positions.description:
Institute for Sanitary Engineering, Water Quality and Solid Waste Management (ISWA). University of Stuttgart
<< http://www.iswa.uni-stuttgart.de/index.en.html >>

Research work as an academic assistant in the laboratory of the ISWA institute during my master’s studies in Germany, carrying out experiments related to the adsorption of ammonium and phosphonates for the treatment of municipal and industrial wastewaters. Experience measuring physicochemical properties of the water, handling laboratory equipment and carrying out adsorption experiment in Batch reactor
profile_positions.title: Academic assistant – Hilfswissenschaftler

profile_positions.description:
Experiences separated by projects:

1) Technical consultancy in hydroelectric projects 
Technical consultancy in mechanical engineering for the hydroelectric projects Hidrosogamoso (820 MW), El Quimbo (400 MW) and PCH Tunjita (20 MW), during the stages of design, construction, assembly and start-up, through the revision of the documentation provided by the manufacturers of the turbines and generators. 
Responsibilities:
- Review the detailed engineering works (technical drawings, reports, P&IDs, etc)
- Review the manuals of assembly, commissioning and O&M 
- Supervise that the machines complied with technical norms such as the ASME-PBVC, ASTM, AWS standards, among others
- Review welding procedure specifications WPS and their respective PQR

2) Factory supervision for a hydroelectric project
Supervision of the construction process of the penstock and bifurcator of the hydroelectric project Cucuana (55 MW) in the factory of the manufacturer. 
Responsibilities: 
- Supervise the activities of assembly, welding, non-destructive tests, pressure tests, dimensional analysis, heat treatment and painting
- Review the dossier of fabrication and documentation provided by the quality department
- Write weekly reports to let the customer know the progress of the work

3) Detailed engineering design for a pumping system
Detailed engineering for a mining company designing the pumping system to extract the water accumulated in the pits of the mine for a project horizon of 15 years. 
- Prepare the detailed engineering (hydraulic calculations, reports, drawings)
- Prepare the technical specifications and complementary documents for the tender
- Contact the suppliers of the mechanical equipment and evaluate the different offers
- Estimate the investment costs CAPEX

4) Wastewater treatment plant
Prepare the data sheets of the cogeneration equipment to participate in the tender of the expansion project of the WWTP Salitre inBogotá
profile_positions.title: Assistant mechanical engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Calculate and design machine elements, related to mechanical power transmission for specific projects according to the necessities of the clients, such as helical, conical and worm gears, drive shafts, bearings, among others. 
- Selection of motor speed reducers and electrical motors
- Sales and commercial assistance of equipment
- Prepare engineer drawings using Solid Edge and Autocad 
- Participate in the maintenance and assembly of several equipment like motor speed reducers, gearboxes.
profile_positions.title: Design engineer

company.name: DAS Experto Ambiental Sudamérica
company.description:
DAS Environmental Experts is a leading environmental technology company with resource-saving and sustainable solutions for process exhaust gas and wastewater treatment.  

The family-run, mid-sized company based in Dresden has more than two decades of market and technology experience. Our employees expand this knowledge worldwide everyday. They are all experts in their field. Together we are able to offer products and services that set international standards. All of this is captured in our slogan, “Environmental Experts”. 

In Latin America we have branches in Argentina and Peru thus carrying out several projects in the continent. We offer solutions for cleaning industrial and sanitary wastewater to protect water, human beings and the environment.
